authors: Darko Perović, Patrick Van Hees, Oriol Rios Rubiras, Saverio La Mendola
summary: Developed an Excel calculator outputting the design fire in any number of electrical racks and cabinets (open or closed) present in CERN facilities. Experimentally characterized smoke produced by fires in most common insulating oils and cable types present at CERN. Used Cone Calorimeter (FTT) coupled with DMS500 fast particulate analyser (CAMBUSTION Ltd). Conducted a literature review and proposed a methodology for addressing vehicle fires at CERN (more than 300 different vehicle types used).
title: Master thesis

authors: Darko Perović, Ivan Glišović, Boško Stefanović
summary: Detailed analysis, calculations and drawings for the whole project from scratch.
title: Bachelor thesis
